original_title: The boys who killed Jamie Bulger
overview: The disturbing film covers the release of Robert Thompson and Jon Venables, the 10 year olds who killed 2 year-old Jamie Bulger in 1893. Explore the protests against their release, the background of the killers, a terrible murder, and impact. We explore claims that their punishment is a sham- our reporter investigates how inmates and whether 8 years can rehabilitate the criminal duo.
title: The boys who killed Jamie Bulger
